title: reward for season 2016
body: last night, sadly season 6 was over :( by the way i was so attempting to get my rank up since the last thursday, but eventually my rank's tear was ended at silver 1 which left one more promoted game until gold 5... probably i could have reached to gold from silver if i had enough time. so could u guys reward me with gold compensation?

replies.body: Way back when I spent the entire last day of the season to try and make it Gold, but couldn't break out of Silver 5.  I was tilted.  I wasn't able to make it then, but the following season with practice I did successfully make it to Gold.  I know you've been through quite a ride, but there's always next season and you have a lot of time to prepare and practice.  We can't adjust rankings, but I wish you the best of luck!
